name: Apple Education Store
description: $100-400 savings on Mac and iPad for students and educators
fullDescription: Apple offers education pricing for college students, parents of college students, and educators at all levels, with savings of $100-400 on Mac and iPad products.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $200 off Mac computers
- Up to $100 off iPad
- Discounted AppleCare+
- Free Apple Music for students (50% off)
- Back to School bonus (June-Sept): free accessories worth up to $199
howToGetIt:
1. Visit apple.com/us-edu/store
2. Shop with .edu email or verify through UNiDAYS
3. Higher education students, parents buying for students, and faculty qualify
4. Homeschool teachers also eligible
5. Discounted prices shown automatically in Education Store
keywords: Apple, student discount, education discount, college, university, teacher, Mac, MacBook, iPad, back to school
